data.text: @HiProletariat But where are our beeping bracelets?
@HeatherRose987 @CarmenShier Ya, I’ve got nothing.  We’ve got nothing. https://t.co/G4yx9FFw23

@HiProletariat @CarmenShier But how does it help, when there is (basically) no PCR testing?  I wanted to “tell” my app that we had tested positive on RATs but you need a code from the Health Unit to report your status to the app. Unless I’m missing something, it’s time to delete the app.
@HiProletariat Hard to shine when very few people are eligible for testing :(
@HiProletariat Thank goodness at least for that.
